content.text:
# 6th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus

This is a list of members of parliament (MPs) elected to the Assembly of the Republic for the 6th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus at the 2005 parliamentary election, which was held on 20 February 2005.
The list below indicates the MPs in the parties in which they were elected.
{| class=wikitable style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:0px; font-size:90%;"
|-
! colspan="2"|Party
! Members
! Change
! Proportion
|-
| style="background: #008000" | || Republican Turkish Party || 24 || 5  || 48%
|-
| style="background: #FF7F00" | || National Unity Party || 19 || 1 || 38%
|-
| style="background: #DC241f" | || Democratic Party || 6 || 1 || 12%
|-
| style="background: #0000FF" | || Peace and Democracy Movement || 1 || 5 || 2%
|-
| colspan="2" | Total || 50 || || 100%
|-
